record.creatorSculptor: French, Daniel Chester, 1850-1931; Potter, Edward Clark, 1857-1923; Pratt, Bella G.
record.description: [Columbus Arch with the "Columbus Quadriga" by Daniel C. French and Edward Clark Potter. On either side of the portal are sculptures representing the "Genius of Navigation" by Bella G. Pratt.]
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. E. R. Walker Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Photo id'd at http://columbus.gl.iit.edu/dreamcity/00044062.html. Mounted with Photography stamp.
